content.text: Not much, just enjoying the morning! How about you?
Same here! I'm a night owl, so I love the peace and quiet of the morning hours.
I'm the opposite! I'm a morning person and I love socializing in the morning.
What do you like to do in the morning?
I like to go for walks, read, or just relax. I also like to catch up on my social media.
Sounds nice! I like to read ebooks on my commute to work. It's a great way to relax and catch up on my reading.
That's a great idea! I'll have to try that sometime.
What do you do for work?
I'm a teacher. I love my job, but it can be stressful.
I can imagine! I'm a stay-at-home mom, but I used to be a teacher.
I'm glad you're enjoying being a stay-at-home mom! I hope you're getting to spend a lot of time with your kids.
I am! They're my best friends.
That's great! I'm glad you're happy.
